original_text: He must burn the fabric, the woven or knitted material of wool or linen, or any leather article that has been spoiled; because the defiling mold is persistent, the article must be burned.
korean_text: 그는 그 색점 있는 의복이나 털이나 베의 날이나 씨나 모든 가죽으로 만든 것을 불사를지니 이는 악성 나병인즉 그것을 불사를지니라

sentences.original_text: the woven or knitted material of wool or linen
or any leather article that has been spoiled
because the defiling mold is persistent
